Upon returning to Boston, Lily is attracted to Ryle Kincaid, a neurosurgeon with a dark side, and old flame Atlas Corrigan. Drama based on the bestselling novel, starring Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni, Jenny Slate and Brandon Sklenar

programme.title: Joker: Folie a Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck meets the love of his life, Harleen 'Lee' Quinzel, while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Musical thriller, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Lady Gaga and Brendan Gleeson

programme.title: The Blind Side
programme.desc: A middle-class family take in a hulking homeless teenager, who has no education or skills to speak of. The indomitable wife encourages him to turn his life around, helping him to get the grades he needs for a college scholarship and hone his sporting skills to become an American football player. Fact-based drama, starring an Oscar-winning Sandra Bullock alongside Quinton Aaron and Tim McGraw

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman
programme.desc: A Navy recruit undergoing officer training has an uneasy romance with a factory worker. He also attracts the attention of a tough, uncompromising sergeant, who sees his potential and is determined to push him to the limit. Romantic drama, starring Richard Gere, Debra Winger, Louis Gossett Jr, Robert Loggia, David Keith and David Caruso

programme.title: Legends of the Fall
programme.desc: A retired army colonel has raised his three sons alone on their remote Montana ranch. But the all-male household is thrown into turmoil when the youngest son brings home his beautiful fiancee, causing jealousy and tensions that culminate in tragedy. Edward Zwick's period drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Brad Pitt, Aidan Quinn, Julia Ormond and Henry Thomas

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Queen Elizabeth I faces threats at home and abroad, as Mary, Queen of Scots plots against her while the King of Spain builds a vast armada to undertake an invasion of England. Unable to reconcile her feelings for the dashing Sir Walter Raleigh with her duty to her country, the monarch engineers a romance between the courtier and one of her ladies-in-waiting. Historical drama sequel, with Cate Blanchett, Clive Owen, Geoffrey Rush and Samantha Morton

programme.title: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
programme.desc: An American naval reserve pilot is called up for service in the Korean War, and must leave his family and civilian job as a lawyer. In command of a corps of naval pilots, he heads a bombing campaign on strategic Communist positions, but later comes to question the morality of the conflict. Adventure, starring William Holden, Grace Kelly, Fredric March and Mickey Rooney

programme.title: Two Mules for Sister Sara
programme.desc: A grizzled drifter rescues a nun from a gang of rapists and gets roped into escorting her across the Mexican desert. He gradually realises there is more to his new companion than meets the eye - and she may be hiding a surprising secret. Don Siegel's Western, starring Clint Eastwood, Shirley MacLaine, Manolo Fabregas, Alberto Morin and John Kelly

programme.title: Love Story
programme.desc: Two students at Harvard University fall in love, but their romance is fated to be cut tragically short by the discovery that one of them has a terminal illness. Romantic drama, starring Ali MacGraw, Ryan O'Neal and Ray Milland

programme.title: The Breakfast Club
programme.desc: Five teenagers who occupy different areas of their school's social structure are thrown together for a Saturday morning detention. During the day, they analyse their behaviour and find unexpected common ground. Drama, directed by John Hughes and starring Emilio Estevez, Judd Nelson, Molly Ringwald, Anthony Michael Hall, Ally Sheedy and Paul Gleason

programme.title: Molly's Game
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about Molly Bloom, an Olympic-class skier who ran the world's most exclusive high-stakes poker game for a decade before being arrested in the middle of the night by FBI agents wielding automatic weapons. Her players included Hollywood royalty, sports stars, business titans and finally - unbeknownst to her - the Russian Mob. Directed by The West Wing creator Aaron Sorkin, and starring Jessica Chastain, Idris Elba and Kevin Costner

programme.title: Legends of the Fall
programme.desc: A retired army colonel has raised his three sons alone on their remote Montana ranch. But the all-male household is thrown into turmoil when the youngest son brings home his beautiful fiancee, causing jealousy and tensions that culminate in tragedy. Edward Zwick's period drama, starring Anthony Hopkins, Brad Pitt, Aidan Quinn, Julia Ormond and Henry Thomas

programme.title: Love Story

programme.title: The Breakfast Club

During the day, they analyse their behaviour and find unexpected common ground. Drama, directed by John Hughes and starring Emilio Estevez, Judd Nelson, Molly Ringwald, Anthony Michael Hall, Ally Sheedy and Paul Gleason

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: Rachel Marron, a famous singer and actress is subjected to death threats by an obsessive fan and persuaded to hire a former secret service agent as her bodyguard. However, neither she or her new minder realise the effect they are about to have on each other's lives. Romantic thriller directed by Mick Jackson, starring Kevin Costner, Whitney Houston, Gary Kemp and Bill Cobbs

programme.title: Molly's Game
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about Molly Bloom, an Olympic-class skier who ran the world's most exclusive high-stakes poker game for a decade before being arrested in the middle of the night by FBI agents wielding automatic weapons. Her players included Hollywood royalty, sports stars, business titans and finally - unbeknownst to her - the Russian Mob. Directed by The West Wing creator Aaron Sorkin, and starring Jessica Chastain, Idris Elba and Kevin Costner

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: A naive young literature student's life is thrown into turmoil by an affair with a mysterious billionaire. Initially she is intrigued by his aloof and distant manner, but soon realises he is harbouring dark secrets and desires. Erotic drama based on EL James' bestseller, starring Jamie Dornan and Dakota Johnson

programme.title: Spy Kids 2: Island of Lost Dreams
programme.desc: The pint-sized secret agents investigate a mad scientist who has meddled with powerful forces and created a host of bizarre mutant animals. However, the villain is not the only problem they have to face, as another pair of youngsters are determined to outshine them. Family adventure sequel, starring Antonio Banderas, Steve Buscemi and Carla Gugino

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: An intelligent parrot falls into late-night conversation with a janitor and ends up recounting the tale of his epic cross-country journey in search of a new life - a plan that went awry when an evil scientist managed to get his hands on the brilliant bird for his own nefarious ends. Family adventure, starring Gena Rowlands, Tony Shalhoub, Cheech Marin, Bruce Davison and the voice of Jay Mohr

programme.title: Save the Cinema
programme.desc: Drama telling the true story of Liz Evans from Carmarthen, south-west Wales, who started a campaign in the 1990s to save the town's Lyric Cinema. With the help of local politician Richard Goodridge, Liz manages to persuade Steven Spielberg to show a premiere of Jurassic Park at the Lyric. Starring Samantha Morton, Tom Felton and Jonathan Pryce

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: Musical based on The Wizard of Oz, featuring an all-black cast. Dorothy is suddenly whisked off to a magical land and makes some unusual friends as she tries to get back home, while avoiding the malevolent attentions of a wicked witch. Directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Diana Ross, Michael Jackson and Richard Pryor

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A private eye is recruited by a group of Buddhist mystics and sent on a mission to rescue an abducted boy whose supernatural powers will enable him to bring about world peace. However, the kidnapper is actually a demon in human form, determined to ensure the youngster does not fulfil his destiny. Comedy fantasy adventure, starring Eddie Murphy, Charles Dance and Charlotte Lewis

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Two bored youngsters are led on a series of zany misadventures when a manic moggy comes knocking at their door with a magical stovepipe hat on his head and mischief in mind. Comedy fantasy based on the children's book by Dr Seuss, starring Mike Myers, Alec Baldwin, Dakota Fanning and Spencer Breslin

programme.title: E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial
programme.desc: A lonely boy befriends an alien who has been left stranded on Earth. The two develop a psychic connection as the boy helps the extraterrestrial to contact his own people and call for rescue. However, living on Earth starts to have a devastating effect on the visitor's health, and a government operative is determined to capture him for study. Steven Spielberg's sci-fi fantasy, starring Henry Thomas, Drew Barrymore, Dee Wallace and Peter Coyote

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: An intelligent parrot falls into late-night conversation with a janitor and ends up recounting the tale of his epic cross-country journey in search of a new life - a plan that went awry when an evil scientist managed to get his hands on the brilliant bird for his own nefarious ends. Family adventure, starring Gena Rowlands, Tony Shalhoub, Cheech Marin, Bruce Davison and the voice of Jay Mohr

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Harold and pals Moose and Porcupine live in a hand-drawn world of limitless possibilities. The trio become concerned when the Old Man, who narrates their illustrated existence, suddenly falls silent. Using his magical crayon, Harold draws a door to the real world and tumbles into the present day as a flesh-and-blood man, who collides head-on with widow Terry and her young son, Mel. Family adventure, starring Zachary Levi, Lil Rel Howery, Zooey Deschanel and Benjamin Bottani

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are entrusted into the care of their sinister uncle, a master of disguise who intends to kill them for the family fortune. Quickly realising he is up to no good, the children flee, moving from one prospective guardian to the next - but their wily relative is never far behind. Comedy adventure based on the children's books, starring Jim Carrey, Meryl Streep, Jude Law, Liam Aitken and Emily Browning, with Kara and Shelby Hoffman

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A private eye is recruited by a group of Buddhist mystics and sent on a mission to rescue an abducted boy whose supernatural powers will enable him to bring about world peace. programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: A teenager at a new school befriends a pretty girl, but her ex-boyfriend is jealous and attacks him. During one particularly bad fight, a wise old caretaker intervenes and defeats the youngster's assailants using his martial arts skills. He goes on to mentor the boy and teach him karate so he can face his enemies in a tournament. Drama, with Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita and Elisabeth Shue

programme.title: Bookworm
programme.desc: Mildred, an 11-year-old girl, finds her world turned upside down when her estranged father, a washed-up magician, takes her on a wild adventure. Family comedy, starring Elijah Wood and Nell Fisher

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A fisherman finds a friend in a lost penguin, and after taking the bird under his wing, he finds a new sense of joy. Director David Schurmann's drama inspired by a true story, starring Jean Reno and Adriana Barraza

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Oscar-winning musical version of the stage play based on Charles Dickens' classic tale about a lonely workhouse orphan who ends up on the cold streets of London, where he falls under the wing of petty crook Fagin and his gang of young backstreet thieves. Featuring the iconic songs Food, Glorious Food, Consider Yourself, As Long as He Needs Me and You've Got to Pick a Pocket or Two. Starring Ron Moody, Mark Lester, Oliver Reed, Jack Wild, Harry Secombe, Shani Wallis and Leonard Rossiter

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: A single father is determined to become a police officer but fails the medical because he is overweight. To compensate, he goes to absurd lengths to succeed in his job as a security guard, but when criminals lay siege to his place of work, he finds his opportunity to prove his worth to law enforcement. Comedy, starring Kevin James and Keir O'Donnell

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: A gifted youngster is packed off by her selfish parents to the prison-like Crunchem Hall School. Once there, she befriends a sweet-natured teacher who convinces her that not all grown-ups are bad - and urges her to use her special powers to turn the tables on the nasty headmistress. Fantasy comedy, adapted from the children's book by Roald Dahl, with Mara Wilson, Pam Ferris, Embeth Davidtz, Rhea Perlman and Danny DeVito, who also directed

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The tiny blue forest-dwelling creatures flee from an evil wizard, only to end up magically transported to modern-day New York. They search for a way to get back to their own village while evading their enemy, who has followed them to the Big Apple. Fantasy comedy, with Neil Patrick Harris, Hank Azaria and Jayma Mays, plus voices of Jonathan Winters and Katy Perry

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: The tiny blue forest-dwelling creatures and their human friends go on a rescue mission to Paris. Their old foe Gargamel the evil wizard has created mischievous smurfs of his own and kidnapped Smurfette to learn the secret of her magic. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Hank Azaria and Neil Patrick Harris, with the voices of Katy Perry and Christina Ricci

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part II
programme.desc: High-kicking teenager Daniel accompanies his venerable mentor Mr Miyagi when he returns to the Japanese province of Okinawa to visit his dying father. However, an old rival of Miyagi's is waiting for them, while Daniel is drawn into a vicious conflict with their enemy's own karate protege. Martial arts sequel, starring Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita and Yuji Okumoto

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Scary sci-fi comedy. Can David Duchovny, Julianne Moore and Orlando Jones save humanity from a rapidly evolving, predatory alien species? Well, DD used to be Fox Mulder, so...

programme.title: Sacramento
programme.desc: An energetic and free-spirited young man convinces his long-time friend, who's settled into domestic life, to go on an impromptu road trip from Los Angeles to Sacramento.

programme.title: Wayne's World
programme.desc: Long-haired layabouts Mike Myers and Dana Carvey try to rescue their TV show from unscrupulous exec Rob Lowe. Contains strong language, sexual scenes and flashing images.

programme.title: The Cinema List:
programme.desc: From pixelated beginnings to the big screen, the Cinema List brings you your favourite games that made it to the movies - from Sonic the Hedgehog 3, Street Fighter and more.

programme.title: Wayne's World 2
programme.desc: Comedy's most loveable metalheads are commanded by Jim Morrison's ghost to stage a rock concert. But their task is threatened when a sleazy record exec tries to steal Wayne's girl.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: A successful and good-looking music executive gets stranded in his New Jersey hometown and becomes reacquainted with the woman who, years earlier, rejected him in high school.

programme.title: Police Academy
programme.desc: Smash hit 80s police comedy. Follow the clueless new coppers as their superiors try and whip them into shape. Call them what you like - just don't call them when you're in trouble!

programme.title: Police Academy 2: Their First Assignment
programme.desc: Mahoney and friends have graduated from the Police Academy and are issued with their first assignment. But are they ready to do battle with a band of graffiti terrorists?

programme.title: Police Academy 3: Back in Training
programme.desc: More clueless coppers step up in this lively sequel. The alumni return to Commandant Lassard's Police Academy to train new recruits - and try and stop it closing.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: Two criminal brothers cause mayhem when they re-form their blues band to raise the funds to save their old orphanage from closure. Comedy, starring John Belushi and Dan Aykroyd.

programme.title: Planes, Trains & Automobiles
programme.desc: A Chicago advertising man must struggle to travel home from New York for Thanksgiving, with a lovable oaf of a shower-curtain-ring salesman as his only companion.

programme.title: Trading Places
programme.desc: The Duke Brothers bet Billy Ray Valentine can succeed like Louis Winthorpe III if their lives are swapped. With Ophelia's help, they seek revenge on the trading floor in New York.

programme.title: 48 Hrs.
programme.desc: Comedy thriller with Nick Nolte and Eddie Murphy. A tough cop is paired with a wisecracking con who can help catch a murderer. Strong language, some that may offend/violence.

programme.desc: A retired boxer returns to the ring for one last shot at the title, but must embark on an illegal weight cut programme first. Sports thriller, starring Orlando Bloom, Caitriona Balfe and John Turturro

programme.title: Xeno
programme.desc: A teenage girl makes friends with an alien after it crashes in the desert. Writer/director Matthew Loren Oates's fantasy adventure, starring Lulu Wilson and Omari Hardwick

programme.desc: Willie's dream of fighting crime with his cop dad is shattered when his baby brother Charlie arrives. And the new family member turns out to have superpowers. Family animation, with the voices of Karen Ardiff and Alex Kelly

programme.desc: When Papa Smurf is taken by evil wizards Razamel and Gargamel, Smurfette leads her fellow blue creatures on a mission to the real world to save him. Live-action animated musical fantasy comedy, featuring the voices of Rihanna, James Corden and Nick Offerman

programme.title: Beast of War
programme.desc: A group of soldiers get stranded on a raft in the middle of the ocean after their ship is sunk, and must battle a great white shark. Writer/director Kiah Roache-Turner's horror thriller, starring Mark Coles Smith and Joel Nankervis

programme.title: The Toxic Avenger
programme.desc: Bob Garbinger is the money-oriented CEO of a factory that is pumping out dangerous chemicals into the close-knit community of St Roma's Villa. Residents are poisoned by toxins, including widowed janitor Winston Gooze, who works at the factory and learns he has an incurable brain condition. Whistleblower JJ shares devastating information about the factory's reckless disregard for public safety and Winston undergoes a physical transformation in response to exposure to toxic ooze. He takes on the form of a hideously deformed vigilante and wreaks havoc on Bob and his brother Fritz. Comedy horror, starring Peter Dinklage, Kevin Bacon and Taylour Paige

programme.title: Cookster: The Darkest Days
programme.desc: Misunderstood by his family, a dyslexic teen becomes a drug dealer, descending into addiction and debt while a dangerous rival threatens his world and his relationship. Drama, starring Craige Middleburg and Nick Moran

programme.title: The Watched
programme.desc: Mina, a 28-year old artist, gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. When Mina finds shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers that are stalked by mysterious creatures each night. Horror, starring Dakota Fanning, Georgina Campbell and Olwen Fouere

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: Daniel and Lacy Barrett's relatively peaceful existence is disturbed when strange things begin to happen around their suburban home. As the situation escalates, the couple become convinced they are being tormented by alien visitors, but when they get in touch with an expert in extraterrestrial activity, they realise their ordeal has only just begun. Sci-fi horror, starring Keri Russell, Josh Hamilton and Dakota Goyo.

programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: Residents of a small Pennsylvania town are disturbed when a UFO crashes into a back garden. Director Marc Turtletaub's comedy drama, starring Ben Kingsley, Harriet Harris and Jane Curtin

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: In 2054, criminal Mickey Barnes signs up to be a worker who agrees to be reprinted every time he perishes. He flees Earth with friend and accomplice Timo on an interstellar mission to the remote colony of Niflheim, masterminded by Kenneth Marshall and his wife, Ylfa. The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planet's surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Ho's sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.title: Gator Creek
programme.desc: A woman and her friends survive a plane crash, but discover something more dangerous lurking in the shallows of the Louisiana everglades. Horror thriller, starring Athena Strates and Madalena Arago

programme.title: If You Were the Last
programme.desc: Adrift in their broken shuttle with little hope of rescue, two astronauts argue over whether they're better off spending their remaining days as friends or something more. Romantic comedy, starring Anthony Mackie and Zoe Chao

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: A giant mutant lizard spawned from an atomic test rampages through the streets of New York, defying the combined might of the US Army and Navy as it searches for a quiet place to hatch its eggs. A bookish radiation expert and a shady French secret agent join forces to defeat the creature. Hollywood remake of the Japanese monster adventure, starring Matthew Broderick, Jean Reno, Maria Pitillo and Hank Azaria

programme.title: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
programme.desc: The nomadic warrior pitches up in the city of a cut-throat desert community in search of his stolen vehicle and ends up making a deal with a local dictator to get rid of her rival for power. However, when the bargain turns sour, he is cast out into the wilderness - where he becomes the unlikely protector of a tribe of feral youngsters. Sci-fi adventure sequel, starring Mel Gibson, Tina Turner and Bruce Spence

programme.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his 'mother', he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielberg's sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances O'Connor

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: On the desert planet Arrakis, freedom fighters Paul and Chani galvanise the Fremen to strike down murderous conspirators against the Atreides dynasty. Sci-fi drama based on Frank Herbert's acclaimed novel, starring Timothee Chalamet, Zendaya, Austin Butler and Rebecca Ferguson

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: In 2054, criminal Mickey Barnes signs up to be a worker who agrees to be reprinted every time he perishes. He flees Earth with friend and accomplice Timo on an interstellar mission to the remote colony of Niflheim, masterminded by Kenneth Marshall and his wife, Ylfa. The 17th iteration of Mickey is presumed dead after a close encounter with creatures on the planet's surface, but is saved from a grim fate, and when he arrives back at base, Mickey meets his reprinted self. Director Bong Joon Ho's sci-fi comedy, starring Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette and Steven Yeun

programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: Residents of a small Pennsylvania town are disturbed when a UFO crashes into a back garden. Director Marc Turtletaub's comedy drama, starring Ben Kingsley, Harriet Harris and Jane Curtin

programme.title: Gator Creek
programme.desc: A woman and her friends survive a plane crash, but discover something more dangerous lurking in the shallows of the Louisiana everglades. Horror thriller, starring Athena Strates and Madalena Arago

programme.title: If You Were the Last
programme.desc: Adrift in their broken shuttle with little hope of rescue, two astronauts argue over whether they're better off spending their remaining days as friends or something more. Romantic comedy, starring Anthony Mackie and Zoe Chao

programme.title: The Ritual
programme.desc: A group of college friends reunites for a hiking trip in Sweden. When one of them is injured, they are forced to make a risky detour through a forest during a rainstorm, which leads them into the clutches of a menacing presence stalking the woods. Horror based on Adam Nevill's novel, starring Rafe Spall and Robert James-Collier

programme.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: A highly advanced robotic boy is created with one purpose - to love his owner as a parent. When he is rejected by his 'mother', he is left to roam the bleak landscapes of a futuristic America with a fellow android, searching for a means of becoming a real boy in the hope of regaining her love. Steven Spielberg's sci-fi drama, starring Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, William Hurt and Frances O'Connor

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: On the desert planet Arrakis, freedom fighters Paul and Chani galvanise the Fremen to strike down murderous conspirators against the Atreides dynasty. Sci-fi drama based on Frank Herbert's acclaimed novel, starring Timothee Chalamet, Zendaya, Austin Butler and Rebecca Ferguson

programme.title: The Accursed
programme.desc: A woman named Elly is asked by family friend Alma to look after an elderly lady living in a remote cabin for a few days. She agrees, but soon discovers there is a demon hiding in the woman, waiting to break free. Horror, starring Mena Suvari, Sarah Grey and Meg Foster

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: Two parents do whatever it takes to keep their children safe in a world full of creatures hunting every sound they hear. Nothing can be heard from the family hiding in silence, but all it takes is one noise and everything can go horrifically wrong. Horror, starring real-life husband-and-wife duo Emily Blunt and John Krasinski, who also directed

programme.title: Pacific Rim
programme.desc: A rift between dimensions opens up at the bottom of the Pacific ocean, and Earth is invaded by gigantic alien monsters. Equally massive robots, each controlled by two human pilots with their minds linked, are created to fight back against the creatures. Sci-fi adventure, starring Charlie Hunnam, Rinko Kikuchi and Idris Elba

programme.title: Sinners
programme.desc: Hoping to escape their troubled pasts, twin brothers return to their hometown to start over, only to find an even darker force waiting to welcome them back. Writer/director Ryan Coogler's blockbusting horror thriller, starring Michael B Jordan, Miles Caton and Saul Williams

programme.title: Blade
programme.desc: A half-vampire possesses all the strengths inherent in bloodsuckers with none of their weaknesses, and is determined to wipe the monsters from the face of the Earth. However, he faces a deadly new threat in a renegade vampire who is close to decoding an ancient prophecy that will allow him to repopulate the world with his kind. Action thriller, starring Wesley Snipes, Stephen Dorff and Kris Kristofferson

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Truck driver Johnny is inspired to establish the Vandals motorcycle club in 1960s Chicago. He assembles a motley crew, including Brucie, Benny, Cal and Zipco. Exuberant outsider Kathy falls under Benny's spell, and they marry, but when the groom is the victim of a violent assault, Johnny exacts revenge, while Kathy fights for her husband's tormented soul. Drama, starring Tom Hardy, Jodie Comer and Austin Butler

programme.title: Against All Odds
programme.desc: A nightclub owner with powerful and sinister connections hires a jobless American footballer to track down his runaway girlfriend hiding out in Mexico. The search leads to a remote island, where events take a complicated turn when the wayward girlfriend and the footballer start to fall for each other. Thriller, starring Jeff Bridges, Rachel Ward, James Woods, Richard Widmark and Jane Greer

programme.title: Rashomon
programme.desc: Acclaimed Japanese director Akira Kurosawa's Oscar-winning thriller focusing on three eyewitnesses' highly personal accounts of a rape and murder, which reveal the true characters and frailties of those involved. Toshiro Mifune, Machiko Kyo and Masayuki Mori star

programme.title: The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone
programme.desc: Twenty years after ordering the murder of his brother, ageing don Michael Corleone is close to fulfilling his dream of severing his family's Mafia ties and gaining legitimacy, but vengeful enemies and the actions of his hot-headed nephew soon draw him back into a life of crime. Francis Ford Coppola's 2020 director's cut of The Godfather: Part III, starring Al Pacino, Andy Garcia, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Eli Wallach and Bridget Fonda

programme.title: Paradise Highway
programme.desc: Sally is a truck driver who is forced to smuggle illegal cargo to save her brother from a lethal prison gang. With FBI operatives on her trail, Sally's conscience is challenged when the last package turns out to be a teenage girl. Drama, starring Juliette Binoche, Frank Grillo and Hala Finley

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: A New England seaside town's tourist season is turned into a nightmare by a giant killer shark. The local police chief's efforts to protect the public are thwarted by the greedy mayor, forcing him to join forces with a grizzled fisherman and an enthusiastic marine biologist to hunt and kill the monster predator. Steven Spielberg's blockbusting thriller, starring Roy Scheider, Richard Dreyfuss and Robert Shaw, with an Oscar-winning score by John Williams. The film also won Academy Awards for Best Sound and Best Film Editing

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: A group of conspirators contracts the Jackal, a professional hitman, to assassinate President Charles de Gaulle of France. The killer starts to put his painstaking plans into action, creating a new identity, establishing his alibi and commissioning a custom-made weapon, while out-foxing the French police at every turn. Fred Zinnemann's adaptation of Frederick's Forsyth thriller, with Edward Fox, Michael Lonsdale, Alan Badel, Tony Britton and Cyril Cusack

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: International thief Simon Templar, a cunning master of disguise with a Swiss bank account almost full enough to retire on, accepts one last job - to steal a female scientist's formula for cold fusion. However, he breaks his own golden rule by getting emotionally involved with the woman, leading to a deadly chase as the pair meet up in Russia and try to flee from the real bad guys. Action adventure, starring Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue and Henry Goodman

programme.title: The Alto Knights
programme.desc: Two rivals fight for control of a major crime family. Director Barry Levinson's drama based on true events, starring Robert De Niro, Cosmo Jarvis and Debra Messing

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: The seaside resort of Amity is terrorised once again by a man-eating great white shark. While police chief Brody struggles to alert the townsfolk to the magnitude of the danger, a group of teenagers - including Brody's two sons - is adrift at sea in waters hunted by the shark. Director Jeannot Szwarc's thriller sequel, starring Roy Scheider, Lorraine Gary and Murray Hamilton, with John Williams once more providing the acclaimed score

programme.title: Against All Odds
programme.desc: A nightclub owner with powerful and sinister connections hires a jobless American footballer to track down his runaway girlfriend hiding out in Mexico. The search leads to a remote island, where events take a complicated turn when the wayward girlfriend and the footballer start to fall for each other. Thriller, starring Jeff Bridges, Rachel Ward, James Woods, Richard Widmark and Jane Greer

programme.title: All the Devils Are Here
programme.desc: Secluded in the middle of Dartmoor, four thieves hide out with nothing to do but count the money and kill time. Thriller, starring Eddie Marsan, Sam Claflin and Burn Gorman

programme.title: True Romance
programme.desc: A shy clerk marries a hooker and kills her pimp, and together they go on the run to Los Angeles with $5million of cocaine they plan to sell. However, the drugs belong to the Mob and hitmen are soon on their trail. Tony Scott's thriller, written by Quentin Tarantino and starring Christian Slater, Patricia Arquette, Dennis Hopper, Gary Oldman, Val Kilmer, Brad Pitt and Christopher Walken

programme.title: Unhinged
programme.desc: Following a minor road-rage incident, single mother Rachel is terrorised by a seemingly mentally ill stranger. She finds herself and everyone she loves the target of a man who feels invisible and is looking to make one last mark upon the world by teaching her a series of deadly lessons. Psychological thriller, starring Russell Crowe and Caren Pistorius

programme.title: The Desperate Hour
programme.desc: Recently widowed mother Amy Carr finds her small town thrown into chaos as a shooting takes place at her son's school. Miles away on foot in the dense forest, Amy desperately races against time to save her son as authorities place the town on lockdown. Thriller, starring Naomi Watts, Colton Gobbo and Sierra Maltby

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: A group of conspirators contracts the Jackal, a professional hitman, to assassinate President Charles de Gaulle of France. The killer starts to put his painstaking plans into action, creating a new identity, establishing his alibi and commissioning a custom-made weapon, while out-foxing the French police at every turn. Fred Zinnemann's adaptation of Frederick's Forsyth thriller, with Edward Fox, Michael Lonsdale, Alan Badel, Tony Britton and Cyril Cusack

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patient's fractured mind as a 24th character with apparent superhuman abilities attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalan's thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley

programme.title: The Towering Inferno
programme.desc: The world's tallest building goes up in flames during the opening celebrations. While Doug Roberts, the architect who designed the skyscraper, tries to save the party-goers trapped on the 135th floor, fire chief Michael O'Hallorhan leads a valiant attempt to fight the blaze. Irwin Allen and John Guillermin shared directing duties on this triple Oscar-winning disaster epic with an all-star cast including Paul Newman, Steve McQueen, Faye Dunaway, William Holden, Fred Astaire, Richard Chamberlain, Susan Blakely and Robert Vaughn

programme.title: The Alto Knights
programme.desc: Two rivals fight for control of a major crime family. Director Barry Levinson's drama based on true events, starring Robert De Niro, Cosmo Jarvis and Debra Messing

programme.title: Jaws 2
programme.desc: The seaside resort of Amity is terrorised once again by a man-eating great white shark. While police chief Brody struggles to alert the townsfolk to the magnitude of the danger, a group of teenagers - including Brody's two sons - is adrift at sea in waters hunted by the shark. Director Jeannot Szwarc's thriller sequel, starring Roy Scheider, Lorraine Gary and Murray Hamilton, with John Williams once more providing the acclaimed score

programme.title: Jaws 3
programme.desc: A shark is captured by divers and put on display in a Florida marine centre, where it ultimately dies. However, examination of the body reveals the seemingly fully-grown shark was actually a baby - and its enormous, ferocious mother soon comes looking for it. Thriller sequel, originally released in cinemas in 3D, starring Dennis Quaid, Simon MacCorkindale, Louis Gossett Jr and Bess Armstrong

programme.title: Ocean's 8
programme.desc: Following in the footsteps of brother Danny, light-fingered Debbie Ocean plans to steal the Toussaint, a $150million necklace from Vogue's Met Gala, with the 'help' of a famous actress. Crime caper, starring Sandra Bullock, Cate Blanchett, Anne Hathaway and Mindy Kaling

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: A Los Angeles taxi driver picks up a sharp-suited fare and is shocked when a dead body almost plunges through his windscreen during the first stop on the journey. The enigmatic passenger then reveals he is a hitman with four more contracts to carry out before the night is over, and forces the driver to help him. Michael Mann's thriller, starring Tom Cruise and Jamie Foxx

programme.title: Entourage: Aquamom
programme.desc: As the premiere of Aquaman approaches, the gang searches for the perfect date for Vince, while Ari is struggling with financial difficulties. Adrian Grenier and Jeremy PIven star

programme.title: Entourage: One Day in the Valley
programme.sub-title: One Day in the Valley Season 3, Episode 2
programme.desc: Aquaman finally opens to the public, but the heat causes people to stay away in droves - and it is left up to Ari and Eric to make sure Vince does not learn the truth, worried it might have a devastating effect on the box office gross. Adrian Grenier, Kevin Connolly and Jeremy Piven star

programme.sub-title: Face of the Franchise Season 2, Episode 1
programme.desc: A TV appearance sees Spencer share airtime with a player he has an antagonistic history with, but it soon becomes a physical confrontation

programme.desc: Spencer's pill-popping is noticed by his doctor, while Vernon and Reggie talk money on a paintballing trip. Comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm: Mister Softee
programme.desc: An ice-cream van brings back painful childhood memories for Larry - and leads to an embarrassing error during a softball game. He also tries to get Jeff an autographed baseball for his birthday, while Leon discovers an unusual way to get respect. With cameos by former baseball stars Mookie Wilson and Bill Buckner

programme.title: Curb Your Enthusiasm: Larry v Michael J Fox
programme.sub-title: Larry v Michael J Fox Season 8, Episode 10
programme.desc: Larry clashes with his new neighbour, Back to the Future star Michael J Fox, and purchases an ill-advised present for Jennifer's son Greg. Meanwhile, Susie is unimpressed by Jeff's level of devotion to her. With New York mayor Michael Bloomberg and The Daily Show's Aasif Mandvi

programme.title: Silicon Valley: The Lady
programme.desc: Dinesh and Gilfoyle become suspicious when a new female employee they recommended is commanding a higher salary than they receive, while Big Head faces the consequences of becoming part of the tech elite when he gets a promotion. Monica and Richard find themselves outvoted as Jared institutes a workplace discrimination policy. Comedy, starring Thomas Middleditch

programme.desc: Carrie dumps Big and starts dating a baseball player. Samantha is dissatisfied with her not-so-well-endowed boyfriend and Charlotte's new man has a constant 'crotch adjustment' problem. Sarah Jessica Parker and Kim Cattrall star

programme.desc: Miranda learns to talk dirty with her lover, while Charlotte invests in a puppy to fill her need for affection. Carrie invites Big to her birthday party and Samantha hesitates to tell her boyfriend a few home truths

programme.desc: Vince receives a visit from an old friend - who is also a former convict. Meanwhile, Ari's daughter gets cosy with an up-and-coming movie star. Adrian Grenier and Jeremy Piven star

programme.desc: Following the massive success of Aquaman, Vince sets his sights on his next dream movie. But first, he and his crew have to befriend the producer which proves to be no easy task. Adrian Grenier stars

programme.sub-title: And the Horse He Rode in On Season 5, Episode 1
programme.desc: A handsome Jewish doctor makes Grace's day when he saves her - on horseback - from being late for her insemination. Meanwhile, Karen is tempted to cheat on her jailbird husband. Guest starring Harry Connick Jr

programme.title: Will & Grace: Bacon and Eggs
programme.desc: Jack lands his dream job as personal assistant to actor Kevin Bacon, and Grace is visited by Dr Leo Markups, who makes her a tempting offer. With Harry Connick Jr and Rip Torn

programme.desc: A series of weird experiences prompts the girls to wonder whether all men are freaks, leading Carrie to rifle through a stranger's apartment in search of evidence. Sarah Jessica Parker stars

programme.desc: Samantha dates a club owner who lies about their possible future together, and Charlotte tries to get her hooks into an actor friend. Miranda fakes ecstasy to boost her new lover's ego, while Carrie thinks she enjoys being single - until an incident at a photoshoot convinces her otherwise

programme.title: Ballers: Elidee
programme.desc: Spencer is forced to deal with repercussions from Vernon's injury, while also preventing his clients being poached by a rival financial manager. Comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: Ballers: World of Hurt
programme.desc: As Spencer and Andre's rivalry intensifies, Vernon's career hangs in the balance, and Jason visits the swamps for a potential new signing. Comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson

programme.title: And Just Like That: Meet Cute
programme.desc: While Carrie questions whether she's ready for more than a casual fling, Miranda worries her relationship with Che is only about sex

programme.title: The Office (US): The Injury
programme.desc: When Michael burns his foot he expects the staff to work around him, but they do not show the sympathy he hoped for. He arranges for a man in a wheelchair to pay a visit to the office so he can show the others what disabled people go through. Meanwhile, Dwight is acting rather strangely

programme.title: The Office (US): The Secret
programme.desc: Jim starts to regret telling Michael about his crush on Pam, and tries bonding with him over lunch at a Hooters restaurant in an effort to keep his feelings a secret - but his efforts are doomed to failure. Meanwhile, Dwight conducts an investigation into Oscar's absence from work

programme.title: Will & Grace: The Kid Stays Out of the Picture

programme.desc: Will has to wait another month for an answer to the insemination issue while Grace focuses on her relationship with Leo, leading to a big argument

programme.desc: Karen and Jack conspire to sort out Will and Grace's differences over parenting by getting them to attend the birthday party Joe and Larry are throwing for their daughter. Eric McCormack and Debra Messing star

Featuring Halle Berry, Hugh Jackman and Kate Winslet

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.desc: Jamie is taking spaghetti bolognese to the next level and re-creating a mind-blowing Jewish-Italian recipe. There's also beef stew with pappardelle.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.desc: Jamie heads for one of the hottest food destinations in Italy, making hand-crafted pasta, a special seafood stew, and the region's answer to paella.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Fast & Simple
programme.sub-title: Smash Burger and Creamy Chicken with Mushrooms
programme.desc: Jamie cooks a midweek meal of speedy sweet pea chicken, a juicy Smash burger and a chicken and mushroom rice traybake. He batch-cooks his seven-veg sauce, followed by a spicy fish soup. And finishes off with a perfect pudding of tinned fruit granita.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Fast & Simple
programme.desc: Jamie cooks a speedy midweek chicken traybake. He shows us cool ways to upgrade salmon, knocks up a shelf-raid quesadilla toastie, and transforms a batch-cook Bolognese into cheesy bread bowls. All finished off with a super simple banoffee tart.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.desc: Jamie visits the pizza capital of Italy to learn recipes from the locals and tries acquapazza, fish poached in crazy water.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.desc: Jamie visits Basilicata in search of some old school Italian recipes and meets a family of shepherds and an 89-year-old macaroni master.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks Italy
programme.desc: Jamie tracks down some fast, fresh and easy recipes, featuring tasty minty pea tortiglioni and gnocchi with roasted tomato sauce and rocket pesto.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern grills his favorite tender cuts of venison and serves it with coal-roasted sweet potatoes. Then, he cooks a hearty pot of classic Louisiana gumbo using wild duck and grills crispy-skinned duck breast for the topping.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern transforms wild duck into a simple grilled appetizer inspired by Japanese tataki and then uses the rest of the duck to make open fire duck noodle soup with fresh egg noodles, lots of aromatic herbs, bean sprouts and squeeze of lime.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Mediterranean Grilled Filets and Salt Crusted Halibut
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern elevates California halibut, first with grilled fillets on saffron labneh with romesco and roasted cabbage. Then, he demonstrates a classic salt-crusted whole halibut, served with whole roasted cauliflower and a rich cream sauce.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern breaks down a whole rabbit to grill with a spicy, Sichuan sauce and plate with panzanella.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern breaks down a whole tuna and serves it three ways: grilled, raw, and poached.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Nashville Hot Pheasant and Mint Basil Lemonade
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern takes a spin on Nashville-style hot fried chicken. Hot and spicy, batter coated, crispy fried pheasant is paired with a spinach salad topped with bacon vinaigrette and ice cold mint basil lemonade.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Grilled Clams Casino and Garlicky Clam Pizza
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern celebrates cherrystone clams with two show-stopping recipes. He prepares classic grilled clams casino with pancetta, then pushes boundaries with an innovative grilled pizza topped with clams, garlic, chiles, and cheese.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern shares his favorite way to prepare wild turkey breast, pan-fried over an open fire. Served with cheese sauce and jalapeno-bacon wild rice. Then, cooks a simple meal of seared salmon and a side of crispy potatoes and onions.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Chicken Fried Deer and Creole Halibut
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern prepares chicken fried axis deer. Next, Chef Zimmern poaches halibut in tomato roux.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Zimmern cooks his version of Peking-style goose. Next, Chef Zimmern cooks a meal of striped bass.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Pit-Cooked Chicken with Alabama White Sauce
programme.desc: Pat Martin travels to Decatur, Alabama to visit a storied institution of barbecue - Big Bob Gibson's. There, he learns the ins, the outs, and the history of a regional delicacy: pit-cooked chicken with Alabama white sauce.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: The Legend of Louis Mueller's Dino Beef Ribs
programme.desc: Pat visits his close friend Wayne Mueller, third-generation pitmaster of Louis Mueller's BBQ, to learn the ins and outs of his famous dino beef ribs.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat Martin travels to a picturesque cattle farm in California's Santa Maria Valley, to hear firsthand from a young pitmaster who has uncovered the secrets of real Santa Maria barbecue.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: The Secret to Texas-Style Smoked Brisket
programme.desc: Pat and his buddy Leonard Botello use the flavors of the beloved native Post Oak to smoke a perfect Central Texas-style beef brisket.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat Martin heads to the Cherokee National Forest for a day of fly fishing with an old friend, and to cook up their fresh catch over the campfire.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Discovering Indian Lamb Kebabs in Nashville
programme.desc: Pat grills riverside with renowned chef Vivek Surti, crafting lamb mamna and chicken kebabs inspired by his Indian heritage.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Hickory Smoked Virginia Ham & Mint Juleps
programme.desc: Pat Martin gets a history lesson on the origin of American barbecue from "The Professor" Tuffy Stone.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Red Curry Braised Pork with Mustard Greens
programme.desc: Pat Martin is in the frozen tundra of Minnesota to visit his new friend, Chef Yia Vang. They brave the cold and break nearly-frozen ground to barbecue a pig's head in the earth.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.desc: Pat meets the trio behind Blood Bros BBQ to discover how three childhood friends seamlessly blended their Asian-American culture with the Texas barbecue traditions they grew up with.

programme.title: Barbecue: Life of Fire
programme.sub-title: Catching Gulf Coast Redfish and Blue Crabs
programme.desc: Pat visits Houston to go Gulf Bay fishing with chef Chris Shepherd, hoping to catch some redfish and gather a side of blue crabs.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Zimmern cooks his version of Peking-style goose. Next, Chef Zimmern cooks a meal of striped bass.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern makes two different dishes with red snapper: fried snapper fingers with a spicy chile-orange mayonnaise dipping sauce and a slow-roasted whole fish with an herb salad and charred miso sweet potatoes.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Boar Ribs and Shrimp and Grits
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern makes a homemade barbecue rub, basting sauce and barbecue sauce for wild boar ribs. Next, chef shares his twist on a classic southern shrimp and grits recipe, adding a side of beautiful wild mushrooms.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Grilled Eggplant Caponata Toast and Crispy Squab Katsu
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern creates an elegant, seared pigeon toast crowned with a Sicilian caponata bursting with grilled eggplant, olives, and capers and a crispy pigeon katsu served with a refreshing shaved cabbage salad and punchy ginger-carrot vinaigrette.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmern's Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Wild Boar Feast: Chorizo with Mussels and Whole Roasted Leg
programme.desc: Wild boar takes center stage! Andrew makes chorizo with mussels, preserved lemon & white wine. Then, he slow-roasts a whole leg over fire, served Southern-style with pickled cherries, glazed onions & mustard sauce.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: In Tucson, Pati learns the basics of artisan bread-making from Don Guerra of Barrio Bakery. She crosses into Sonora, Mexico, to see where the wheat is from. Back in her kitchen, Pati creates a menu of tasty recipes using wheat flour.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati spends a day in Sonora's capital, Hermosillo, visiting some of the city's best culinary destinations. From gigantic burritos at Doa Guille to Sonoran hot dogs, Pati experiences all Hermosillo's food scene has to offer.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: On the coast in Baha Kino, local fishermen catch giant sea scallops. Then, in the mountain town of Matape, Nere, one of Sonora's few female butchers shares her wisdom with Pati.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati learns that carne asada goes way beyond grilled meat in Sonora. It's an important weekly ritual that brings the whole family together.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati tours one of Hermosillo's oldest flour mills and gets a lesson on making coyotas, a traditional dessert, at a local bakery. In her kitchen, Pati shares her take on a classic Sonoran recipe - a carne con chile burrito.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati spends a day in the kitchen with her middle son, Sami, cooking recipes inspired by her travels in Sonora that she knows he'll love - beef and potato chimichangas, rice with lentils and caramelized onions, and an avocado and radish salad.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati travels to Sonora's coast on the Sea of Cortez, where local legend Too Contreras gives her a tour including shellfish on the beach, his restaurant Mariscos El Rey, and his home kitchen for some crave-worthy recipes.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati makes three classic Sonoran recipes- a fish special called pescado zarandeado, a rich stew called gallina pinta, and a tasty dirty rice with clams. In Sonora, she visits vacation destination Puerto Peasco.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.sub-title: The Nectar of the Mayan Gods
programme.desc: Pati is in the magic town of Man to learn about something sacred to the Mayans - bees and honey. A group of women who protect the endangered Melipona, a stingless bee native to Yucatn, invites her to join in a Mayan energy cleansing ritual.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: In Tekit The Capital of the Guayabera Pati encounters a tale of sons going against their father's wishes to follow their own path. Pati meets a farmer's son who went against his father to build a family business making the iconic Guayabera shirts.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati explores the streets of Yucatn's capital, Mrida. She tries the best tacos in Mrida at Wayan'e. The aroma of freshly made cookies lures her to Dond Fabric, where their globitos and bizcochitos are an important part of Mrida's mornings.

programme.title: Pati's Mexican Table
programme.sub-title: An Underground Pit of Cochinita Pibil
programme.desc: Pati visits Chef Wilson Alonzo in his hometown of Halach to prepare a traditional Cochinita Pibil in an underground pit. Pati helps Wilson prepare the achiote marinade, along with his grandmother who taught him traditional cooking.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat
programme.sub-title: Perfecting Puff Pastry in Burgundy, France
programme.desc: Acclaimed chef Michael Caines takes Fred to Burgundy to amazing places to eat serving the finest French country cooking and exquisite patisserie.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat
programme.sub-title: Searching for the Best Pizza in Rome, Italy
programme.desc: Chef Giorgio Locatelli takes Fred to Rome in search of the city's most exciting eats. Sublime pasta, fluffy gnocchi and the world's best pizza all delicious but affordable.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat
programme.sub-title: Baking Artisinal Pastries in Mallorca, Spain
programme.desc: Pastry Chef Ravneet Gill takes Fred to Mallorca to experience incredible island cooking, from a buzzing beach bar serving holiday food in the sun, to light and fluffy pastries.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat
programme.sub-title: Perfecting Puff Pastry in Burgundy, France
programme.desc: Acclaimed chef Michael Caines takes Fred to Burgundy to amazing places to eat serving the finest French country cooking and exquisite patisserie.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat
programme.sub-title: Searching for the Best Pizza in Rome, Italy
programme.desc: Chef Giorgio Locatelli takes Fred to Rome in search of the city's most exciting eats. Sublime pasta, fluffy gnocchi and the world's best pizza all delicious but affordable.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat
programme.sub-title: Baking Artisinal Pastries in Mallorca, Spain
programme.desc: Pastry Chef Ravneet Gill takes Fred to Mallorca to experience incredible island cooking, from a buzzing beach bar serving holiday food in the sun, to light and fluffy pastries.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: In Greece, the Intercity Express travels from Thessaloniki to Athens, passing sites like the Meteora peaks, Delphi ruins and the Acropolis; the journey continues to the Peloponnese on Greece's last cogwheel train.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: Andalusia, now crossed by high-speed and modernized rail lines, unveils its rich culture and landscapes; along the journey, we visit cities like Seville, Granada with its famed Alhambra and Guadix near the Tabernas desert.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: The Cinque Terre Express runs along Italy's northern coast east of Genoa; passing through five UNESCO-listed villages, it offers coastal views and access to cobbled streets, harbors, terraced vineyards and pastel-colored houses.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: Corsica, the Island of Beauty, is best explored by railway; from Mediterranean waters to towering peaks, stops include Algajola for a seaside dive, Vizzanova on the GR20 trail and historic cities like Corte with its citadel.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: In Portugal, in the Douro River Valley, a steam locomotive and a small historic train will take you in turn to the water's edge, on the only railroad line in the world that crosses three World Heritage Sites classified by UNESCO.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat
programme.desc: TV Chef Andi Oliver takes Fred to Marrakech to enjoy lamb and couscous at legendary restaurant, chicken tagine for under 10, and breakfast on a roof terrace.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat
programme.desc: Fred Sirieix is heading to Bristol for a winter treat in the company of Michel Roux Junior. Michel can't wait to show Fred his favourites, from the perfect French bistro to a festive countryside escape and Jamaican jerk turkey.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat
programme.desc: Chef Nadiya Hussain shows Fred the culinary sights of Yorkshire including Bettys' iconic tea and cakes, a rural Wensleydale cheese farm and shop, and a small restaurant which serves home made samosas, Nadiya's favourite spicy Indian snack.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat
programme.desc: Food writer Rachel Khoo takes Fred to Vienna to experience exquisite coffee and cake, comforting dumplings, and mangalitza pork schnitzel.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat
programme.desc: Chris Bavin takes Fred to the New Forest, where fresh local produce is king. Featuring wood-fired cooking, pork pies and a country pub serving the perfect Ploughman's.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Road Trip
programme.sub-title: Mamma Mia! Off We Go Again
programme.desc: Gordon, Gino and Fred travel to Greece to immerse themselves in the culinary traditions. The taste buddies go island-hopping, keen to learn more about the Mediterranean diet and how the country has one of the healthiest populations in the world.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Road Trip
programme.sub-title: Go Greek! Clash of the Titans
programme.desc: The boys are in the Greek capital Athens in a vintage VW campervan. This is where high-concept cuisine originated & is still being re-invented, in a city known as the birth place of democracy and the cradle of western civilisation.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Road Trip
programme.desc: On a mission to taste the worlds best breakfast, the three big egos Gordon, Gino and Fred are venturing out of their comfort zones crossing over the USA boarder into Mexico. They hope to stay out of trouble as they drive their bad boy transporter.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Road Trip
programme.desc: Gordon wants to show Fred & Gino that the food and fresh produce are off the charts! In Las Vegas they indulge in one of the most expensive beef burgers. After a night at the casino they're on the road again to experience the real wild west.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Road Trip
programme.desc: Gino & Fred are excited to head to San Francisco for their very own Summer of Love. Gordon tries to embrace the flower power mood, but he's more interested in the 61 Michelin Stars. The boys travel to a Napa Valley vineyard in a hot air balloon.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Road Trip
programme.desc: After four weeks on the road Gino's airing his feet in the back seat as the guys cruise along a Texan highway. Texas is a meat lovers paradise and Gordon is keen to show the Europhiles some of the best BBQ known to man.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks the Mediterranean
programme.desc: Jamie's soaking up inspiration in Spain with tapas, flavor-charged rice dishes, and spectacular seafood. He cooks a stunning pork chop with peppers and alioli and a surf and turf skewer of prawns, mushrooms, and local ham.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks the Mediterranean
programme.desc: Jamie heads to Greece, to the island of Skopelos, starting on the mainland in Thessaloniki. Inspired by meze plates and traditional island cuisine he cooks up a smoky aubergine flatbread and a lemony chargrilled chicken with tzatziki and rice.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks the Mediterranean
programme.desc: Jamie explores Tunisia to meet traditional couscous makers, eat delicious street food, and get invited to cook with local chefs on a beach. Inspired by everything he sees, Jamie cooks crispy prawn parcels and a chicken and merguez sausage stew.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks the Mediterranean
programme.desc: Jamie heads to Marseille in the south of France. Inspired by their stunning seafood, the traditional flavors of Provence, and the multicultural dishes being served up there, he cooks up a steak with a twist and a sublime courgette and olive tart.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver Cooks the Mediterranean
programme.desc: Jamie heads to Greece, to the island of Skopelos, starting on the mainland in Thessaloniki. Inspired by meze plates and traditional island cuisine he cooks up a smoky aubergine flatbread and a lemony chargrilled chicken with tzatziki and rice.

programme.desc: The boys are in the Greek capital Athens in a vintage VW campervan. This is where high-concept cuisine originated & is still being re-invented, in a city known as the birth place of democracy and the cradle of western civilisation.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Road Trip
programme.desc: On a mission to taste the worlds best breakfast, the three big egos Gordon, Gino and Fred are venturing out of their comfort zones crossing over the USA boarder into Mexico. They hope to stay out of trouble as they drive their bad boy transporter.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Road Trip
programme.desc: Gordon wants to show Fred & Gino that the food and fresh produce are off the charts! In Las Vegas they indulge in one of the most expensive beef burgers. After a night at the casino they're on the road again to experience the real wild west.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Road Trip
programme.desc: Gino & Fred are excited to head to San Francisco for their very own Summer of Love. Gordon tries to embrace the flower power mood, but he's more interested in the 61 Michelin Stars. The boys travel to a Napa Valley vineyard in a hot air balloon.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Road Trip

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: In Portugal, in the Douro River Valley, a steam locomotive and a small historic train will take you in turn to the water's edge, on the only railroad line in the world that crosses three World Heritage Sites classified by UNESCO.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: Andalusia, now crossed by high-speed and modernized rail lines, unveils its rich culture and landscapes; along the journey, we visit cities like Seville, Granada with its famed Alhambra and Guadix near the Tabernas desert.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: In Greece, the Intercity Express travels from Thessaloniki to Athens, passing sites like the Meteora peaks, Delphi ruins and the Acropolis; the journey continues to the Peloponnese on Greece's last cogwheel train.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys
programme.desc: The Cinque Terre Express runs along Italy's northern coast east of Genoa; passing through five UNESCO-listed villages, it offers coastal views and access to cobbled streets, harbors, terraced vineyards and pastel-colored houses.
